name: Qubiqle, Inc.
description: Developer of accounting software intended to digitize the restaurant invoicing process. The company's platform offers a range of services including invoice management, bill payments, invoice insights, spend management, and analytics as well as cloud-based data storage, enabling clients to track their costs efficiently, manage finances in a better way, and get better predictive insights.
one_liner: Developer of accounting software intended to digitize the restaurant invoicing process. The company's platform offers a range of services including invoice management, bill payments, invoice insights, spend management, and analytics as well as cloud-based data storage, enabling clients to track their costs efficiently, manage finances in a better way, and get better predictive insights.
